((ooc-so now we are all "idiots", even though this maybe controlling 
others,i think that evreyone here has is fed up with your b/s.BTW,you 
cant do anything about me,you dont have a seat on the council,and if 
you do talk to them what r u going to say,gee council men i think 
that firestorm should be out because he makes too many valid points 
and hes slapping me around like a ho?i dont think so)))
